title: Anne, Queen of Great Britain
summary: Anne (6 February 1665 â€“ 1 August 1714)[lower-alpha 1] was Queen of England, Scotland and Ireland between 8 March 1702 and 1 May 1707. On 1 May 1707, under the Acts of Union, the kingdoms of England and Scotland united as a single sovereign state known as Great Britain. She continued to reign as Queen of Great Britain and Ireland until her death in 1714.
